title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 62-2.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 62-2.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This section shall apply to all claims made on and after January 1, 1982 arising under policies providing coverage against the peril of fire on real and personal property located in this State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
62-2.1

Amended, New

York State Register, Volume XXXVI, Issue 27, effective
7/9/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
